scripts.dev: bunx concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "cd backend && bun run dev" "cd frontend && bun run dev"
scripts.install:all: cd backend && bun install && cd ../frontend && bun install
scripts.lint: bun run typecheck && bunx ultracite check
scripts.typecheck: cd backend && bun tsc --noEmit && cd ../frontend && bun tsc --noEmit
scripts.test: bun run test:backend && bun run test:frontend
